content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ ** get this in the cozy wheat collection 1 ** https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/cozy-wheat-crochet-collection# 2 from the inventor of the wheat stitch™ comes the **braided wheat stitch™ crochet blanket** is perfect for cozying up with this season crocheted using delightful puff stitches and in one piece this stunning blanket is not only beautiful but also incredibly soft available in multiple sizes it s perfect for snuggling on the couch or adding a touch of warmth to your bed whether you re a beginner or an experienced crocheter this pattern is easy to follow and will inspire your creativity this blanket pattern comes with a video tutorial originally published october 2024 crochet hook h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 3 notions removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 yarn lion brand color theory 7 100% acrylic 246yds/100g yarn substitutes wecrochet swish 8 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g lion brand mandala ombre 9 100% acrylic 344yds/150g herrschners supreme worsted yarn 10 100% acrylic 169yds/100g mary maxim starlette worsted 11 100% ultra soft acrylic 180yds/100g mary maxim maximum value yarn 12 100% acrylic 474yds/227g herrschners worsted 8 heathers yarn 13 100% acrylic 489yds/226g yardage total yardage will depend on size see chart on page 4 for yardage and number of skeins needed abbreviations chain - chain blo - back loop only rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side gauge 15 sts x 12 row = 4x4 in stitch pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 14 sizes this blanket has instructions in 16 sizes from a small lovey blanket to a king-size bed throw skill level intermediate let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 15 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 16 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 17 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 18 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 19 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 20 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2024 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to
